name: test_past_horizon[plutus_v2-10000]
description:
Test minting a token with ttl too far in the future.

        Uses `cardano-cli transaction build` command for building the transactions.

        Expect failure.

        * try to mint a token using a Plutus script when ttl is set too far in the future
        * check that minting failed because of 'PastHorizon' failure
descriptionHtml:
Test minting a token with ttl too far in the future.

    Uses `cardano-cli transaction build` command for building the transactions.

    Expect failure.

    * try to mint a token using a Plutus script when ttl is set too far in the future
    * check that minting failed because of 'PastHorizon' failure
statusMessage: Skipped: runs only with Babbage+ TX; needs PlutusV2 cost model
statusTrace: ('/home/martink/Source/repos/cardano-node-tests2/cardano_node_tests/tests/test_plutus_mint_build.py', 1080, 'Skipped: runs only with Babbage+ TX; needs PlutusV2 cost model')
